WorkItem.Description:
I have uninstall it and then reinstall after downloading again, but it doesn't work.
Please solve this issue as soon as possible.
I have to do my college work by using Turbo C++.

Comments.Message:
Hi,

I've tested Turbo C++ on Windows 10. Please provide the more details about your system configuration or send the system info report by using following commands.

1. Open cmd
2. Run command systeminfo > systeminfo.txt
3. Find the systeminfo.txt in same path, which showing by your cmd

After generating system report please attach report to vineetchoudhary291[at]gmail.com or in this thread. Then, I'm able to help you.
